books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence and to cultivate a will to lead.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by Tina Fey
books.description: A memoir from the former "Saturday Night Live" star and creator of "30 Rock."
books.name: BOSSYPANTS

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Susannah Cahalan
books.description: A medical mystery in which doctors struggle to discover why a young reporter suddenly experiences seizures, hallucinations and eventually near catatonia.
books.name: BRAIN ON FIRE

books.author: by John Gerzema and Michael D’Antonio
books.description: How feminine values of nurturing, listening and collaborating are redefining success for both genders.
books.name: ATHENA DOCTRINE

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of John F. Kennedy, a tragedy that has left a lasting imprint on the nation.
books.name: KILLING KENNEDY

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A member of the Navy SEALs who had the most career sniper kills in United States military history discusses his childhood, his marriage and his battlefield experiences during the Iraq war. Kyle was recently shot to death in Texas.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by Mary Roach
books.description: A science writer’s pilgrimage down the digestive tract; by the author of “Stiff,” “Spook,” “Bonk” and “Packing for Mars.”
books.name: GULP

books.author: by Debbie Reynolds and Dorian Hannaway
books.description: A second memoir by the actress, singer and dancer presents stories about her show-business friends, her man and money troubles, and her children.
books.name: UNSINKABLE

books.author: by Gabrielle Reece with Karen Karbo
books.description: The athlete and fashion model discusses her marriage, relationship issues and aging gracefully.
books.name: MY FOOT IS TOO BIG FOR THE GLASS SLIPPER

books.author: by Susan Cain
books.description: Introverts — one-third of the population — are undervalued in American society.
books.name: QUIET

books.author: by Mark Mazzetti
books.description: The Times’s national security correspondent describes how the lines between the C.I.A. and the American military have been blurred.
books.name: WAY OF THE KNIFE

books.author: by Charles Graeber
books.description: A journalist tells the story of Charlie Cullen, the serial killer known as “the Angel of Death,” implicated in the deaths of as many as 300 patients in a string of hospitals.
books.name: THE GOOD NURSE

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II after his plane went down over the Pacific.
books.name: UNBROKEN
